Servers.Name: SQLiteNorthwind
Servers.ConnectionString: Provider=SQLite;Data Source=..\Northwind\db\Northwind.db;Version=3; DateTimeFormat=Ticks; Pooling=True; Max Pool Size=100;

Servers.Name: SqlCeNorthwind
Servers.ConnectionString: Data Source=..\Northwind\db\Northwind.dat;Max Buffer Size=1000;Persist Security Info=False;
